Email body: Hello Test,
We received a request to reset your password. If you did not make this request, please ignore this email.
To reset your password, please click the following link: http://localhost:8080/reset-password?token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJyZXNldEBleGFtcGxlLmNvbSIsImlhdCI6MTc0ODIwMjU1OSwiZXhwIjoxNzQ4Mjg4OTU5fQ.1ADqj06EceNwAsYpgX4He7XXuQGsc0zf76pk97_oBv0
This link will expire in 24 hours.
Best regards, HeartRate Team Hibernate: select u1_0.id, u1_0.date_of_birth, u1_0.email, u1_0.first_name, u1_0.gender, u1_0.last_name, u1_0.password, u1_0.reset_token, u1_0.reset_token_expiry, u1_0.zip_code from users u1_0 where u1_0.email=?
